Purple Prairie Botanicals Avocado Coconut Exfoliating Mask  (2019 formulation)

Brand: Purple Prairie Botanicals

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua (water), hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel), Persea Gratissima (avocado) Oil, Montmorillonite (French Green Clay), Zeolite Amargosa (clay), bentonite (clay), organic cocos nucifera (coconut), oenothera
book: 2081-Purple Prairie Botanicals Avocado Coconut Exfoliating Mask  (2019 formulation)

coconut), oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil, cetearyl alcohol, pelargonium graveolens (geranium) oi, cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract

Directions: Apply to face in a circular motion to lightly exfoliate. Avoid eyes. Allow to completely dry for extra goodness. Wash off and enjoy your reb

f and enjoy your reborn skin.

Warnings: External Use Only.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
